alert.note: Alert for Sussex (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 2:48PM EST until December 29 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Light snow and sleet transitioning to light freezing rain and freezing drizzle. Total snow and sleet accumulations of less than an inch. A light glaze of ice is expected. * WHERE...The Pennsylvania counties of Carbon and Monroe, as well as Sussex County in New Jersey. * WHEN...From 6:00 PM this evening until 7:00 AM Wednesday. * IMPACTS...A light glaze of ice may develop on untreated roads and walkways, creating slippery conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The potential for freezing and freezing drizzle is confined mainly to locations above 1000 feet in elevation.
info.instruction: Use extra caution if traveling tonight. The latest road conditions for your state can be obtained by dialing 5 1 1.
